name: Color Borders
description:
Colorize all areas of the respective object without the adjacent areas having the same color.

This game is made for puzzle and thinking-loving players and for all those who like to relax little bit.

At the moment there are 8 levels in the style of building blocks and dreamy toy figures and a step by step tutorial.

My name is Kinga Kroliczek and I am an Environment Artist and Game Design student at Mainz University of Applied Sciences.

So feel free to play my game and leave a comment.
